questions.question: Do you have a high school diploma or equivalent?
Do you have two years of patient access, revenue cycle or other healthcare experience?
Do you have one year of prior leadership related experience?
Are you willing to obtain a healthcare revenue cycle related certification within 1 year?
Please describe your relevant experience in patient access, revenue cycle operations, and leadership.
questions.answer:
I bring over 20 years of healthcare and administrative experience, including direct supervision of front desk and call center operations at Midwest Sports Medicine (1999-2002). In this role, I managed patient registration, scheduling, and insurance verification processes while supervising and training staff. I developed workflows, implemented quality assurance measures, and coordinated with multiple departments to ensure efficient patient flow.

Currently, I support 3 AVPs and manage a team of 30 staff members, where I've implemented systems that reduced call volume by 70%. I have extensive experience in developing and updating departmental procedures, training staff, and maintaining efficient workflows. My background includes roles at Family Medicine and Fox Lake Animal Hospital, where I managed patient/client registration, maintained accurate records, and coordinated with clinical staff.

I am proficient in healthcare software systems, including experience with billing systems and Microsoft Office Suite. I have consistently demonstrated success in process improvement, team leadership, and maintaining high standards of patient service while ensuring accurate registration and documentation.

questions.question: Are you available to work 2nd shift (80 hours/2 weeks)?
Do you have experience with PPM and STAR billing systems?
questions.answer: While I have extensive experience with various healthcare software systems, I am eager to learn and quickly become proficient in PPM and STAR billing systems. My background includes working with similar billing and registration systems, and I have a proven track record of quickly adapting to new software platforms.
